Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Finsbury Serviced Apartments in London (Highbury), you'll be close to Finsbury Park and London Zoo. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Emirates Stadium and Almeida Theatre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in of the guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Business, Other Amenities
Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

With a stay at Finsbury Serviced Apartments in London (Highbury), you'll be close to Finsbury Park and London Zoo. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Emirates Stadium and Almeida Theatre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Finsbury Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Emirates Stadium - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Almeida Theatre - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Highgate Ponds - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
London Canal Museum - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi
Alexandra Palace - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Angel Building - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Sadler's Wells Theatre - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Kenwood House - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
British Library - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Geffrye Museum - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Hackney Empire - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Keats House - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Cartwright Gardens - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
London Fields - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 12.8 km / 8 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 25.8 km / 16 mi

The preferred airport for Finsbury Serviced Apartments is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
